item.title: Firebase-RealtimeDatabase & Self-assesment
item.description: Hi!, its been a wild month, jumping all over the places, future me reading!, keep your composure. Coming to other things, I’ve been doing work from home for the past year, but recently (the past 3 months) I was asked to come office atleast a week or two. Although some of my friends are still doing WFM, I had to go chennai, Which I felt was bad, but this is not a major consern.
